name: Blob Clash
description:
Blob Clash is a twin-stick multiplayer shooter where players' blobs shatter each other using their magical, projectile firing cylinders. Yes, apparently that's a thing now.

The flexible game style allows for many different types of play, from a bullet smothered free-for-all to 2v2 gameplay to homemade brackets for larger groups.

Controls:

  • Move: Left Stick, A/D keys, Left/Right arrow keys
  • Jump: Button South (gamepad), LT (gamepad), LB (gamepad), Space, W, Up arrow key
  • Aim: Right Stick (gamepad), Mouse movement (mouse)
  • Shoot: RT (gamepad), Left Click (mouse)
  • Pause: Menu (gamepad), Esc (keyboard)

Features:

  • 1-4 local multiplayer
  • Supports keyboard, mice and controllers
  • 14+ maps
  • Perfectly rounded blob characters

Coming soon:

  • Online multiplayer
  • Powerups
  • Many settings for accessibility and control rebinding
  • Like a million minor changes
  • ...and more!

Feedback/Bug reports:

As Blob Clash is in active development, feedback and bug reports are very helpful in making the game as good as it can be. You can do this at the Blob Clash Google Drive feedback folder.
